:::Nemesis felt the pain of a thousand suns hitting him, a thousand years of 
studying the Black Arts and he had felt nothing like this. all his energy 
went into staying alive. he was... just barley, he lifted his head and said 
in a small weak voice:::

Nemesis: 'you think you can still defeat me? i will not die, no matter how 
hard you try... i will live to see you die'

:::then an organic creature came into the room, it was what humans would 
someday call a Devil. it looked at the dying Nemesis and said:::

"Come Angel Nemesis, you must come and meet the pit... He has decided to 
reformat you!"

:::The Devil lifted nemesis into its arms and brought him to the pitt. the 
pitt said to nemesis

"you have powers, but now you must serve my purpose, be reformatted!"

Nemesis gained back all his power, he gained even more... His chrome metal 
body  became jet black. And he grew. he had become a seven foot jet black 
Emissary of the pitt:::

"Now go and do as you are bided nemesis Left and re appeared in africa, he 
sat down and began to take in his new form:::

OOC: I'm sorry but i just cant kill off AngelNemisis, he is to important, he 
is now an Emissary of the pitt. He will not Bother anyone until Child is 
trained
